summary: CONSTANT DOOR AJAR WARNING WHEN ALL DOORS ARE CLOSED (OR OPEN) DRAINS BATTERY AND CONTINUALLY SETS OFF CAR ALARM.   DOORS NO LONGER LOCK WHEN CAR IS IN MOTION.  DOORS CANNOT BE LOCKED ONCE PARKED OR ALARM WILL SOUND WITHIN 10-15 MINUTES.  ISSUE HAS DRAINED MULTIPLE BATTERIES AND STRANDED OWNER.   DOME LIGHTS COME ON UNEXPECTEDLY WHILE DRIVING AT NIGHT - ISSUE OCCURS ON STREETS AND HIGHWAYS.  FORD DEALER RECOMMENDS REPLACING ALL DOOR LATCHES AT >$200 A PIECE WITH NO GUARANTEE OF ISSUE NOT RECURRING.
